metadata.title: CVE-2021-42782 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Stack buffer overflow issues were found in Opensc before version 0.22.0 invarious places that could potentially crash programs using the library.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
